snippet.title: Last Epoch Patch 1.1 - Harbingers of Ruin | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Patch 1.1 - Harbingers of Ruin launches July 9th at 11am CST. 

Check out the first blog post detailing whats new in Patch 1.1 - Harbingers of Ruin: https://forum.lastepoch.com/t/harbingers-of-ruin-whats-new

Wishlist now and get 20% off during the Steam Summer Sale on June 27th - July 11th! 

Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/899770/Last_Epoch/

About Last Epooch
Uncover the Past, Reforge the Future. Ascend into one of 15 mastery classes and explore dangerous dungeons, hunt epic loot, craft legendary weapons, and wield the power of over a hundred transformative skill trees. Last Epoch is being developed by a team of passionate Action RPG enthusiasts. 

FOLLOW US
Get the Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/899770/Last_Epoch/
Website: https://lastepoch.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/lastepoch
Forum: https://forum.lastepoch.com​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lastepoch
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lastepochgame/
